name: salamencite
effect: Held: Allows Salamence to Mega Evolve into Mega Salamence.
short_effect: Held: Allows Salamence to Mega Evolve into Mega Salamence.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Salamence hold it, and this stone will enable it
to Mega Evolve during battle.
